headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.vercel.app *.googleapis.com *.gstatic.com *.facebook.net *.tiktok.com *.google-analytics.com *.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: *.vercel.app *.facebook.com *.google-analytics.com dbp.dockbloxx.com; connect-src 'self' *.vercel.app *.googleapis.com *.google-analytics.com *.facebook.net *.tiktok.com dbp.dockbloxx.com; frame-src 'self' *.facebook.com *.google.com *.youtube.com
